answers.answer: Just try to rest, lay down and see if it helps. If it gets to be too much I'd go into l&d, at least that's what dr told me
This is kind of a dumb question, but do you know what they will do at labor and delivery for it? I don't want to go in and them just tell me it's fine lol.

Im right there with you makayla! I am having sharp shooting pains down there and so much pressure that it literally hurts to walk . Its been like this for 6+ hours, I'm having the worst b.h's in my back and my stomach.. waiting on my Dr to call me back to see if I need to go in or not... I'd really hate to go in and be sent right back home...

I have had a few Braxton Hicks, but not since this morning. I'm hoping he stays in at least until the 25th, because the person watching my daughter when I go into labor is out of town right now! Don't you just hate having to play the waiting game with the doctors office?
I've had b.hs four days straight and there only getting stronger! I called over 35 mins ago... Its aggravating me now... I hate waiting on people
L&d just going to hook u up watch for couple hours and see if its labor if not home you go.. been hurting like that for weeks.. I have told myself I am not going back in until my water breaks

I have so much pain in my pelvic area,, its pressure also but its very painful when I get up from a sitting/laying position..I told my midwife a couple of wks ago and has scheduled me to see a chiropractor because she thinks baby might be laying on a nerve or something the chiropractor is going to reposition the baby to get her off,, it hurts when I left my leg to get in the bed hurts to get of bed,, everything else is fine no other big symptoms,,, I know they cant do anything if I go to l&d so im just gonna take a warm bath,, luckily when I switch positions it stops the pain,, good luck ladies

@hthompson that's why I don't want to go! I don't want to waste my time and having nurses looking at me like oh lord another one over reacting ! But my sister just called to see what my Dr said and my Dr said to come in and be monitored so I told my sister that and then told her I didn't want to go and she said "well what if you don't go and something bad happens" now I feel like I need to go! I had a normal pregnancy with my son until the end and then went to the hospital one day because I wasn't feeling right and ended up being taking to l&d immediatly to start inducing me because I had preeclampsia to the max, the nurse said she was shocked that I hadn't had a seizure yet because my b.p was so high... I just got out the shower, my bf just got in, he thinks I'm over reacting and its making me feel bad to drag him up there but I guess I need to make sure everything's ok!
I would go at least for piece of mind. They send you home at least u know baby is ok. Im sure you won't be the last mommy to go to the ER for pain :)

question: I am having a lot of pressure right now, probably for the last 45 minutes. It hurts to sit or walk. Is there anything besides a bath that I can do for pain? And is this just him pushing down?
title: Pelvic pressure
